text:
Hey <@U05TTKQ4G3Z>,
if you have the link saved as a property in your CRM,
you can write
```click <a href={{ contact.personalized_link }}>here</a> to learn more```
while "personalized link" is the name of the property.

if it's a company information you can do it like
```{{ company.personalized_link }}```
...

If you're not 100% sure if you got the right property - open any rich-text, select "personalize", select the property you're looking for, open the source code view of the rich-text and it will show you the correct property "path"

Hello!  Does anyone know if I am able to clone and edit this HubSpot email module?  The only one I can find under `<@UDA553DRD>` in the design manager, `email_social_sharing.module`, seems to not be the same one
